item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 21, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. IronRDP: a Rust implementation of Microsoft's RDP protocol (185 points | 100 comments)
2. Show HN: A terminal emulator in pure PHP (49 points | 26 comments)
3. Chunking Attacks on File Backup Services Using Content-Deﬁned Chunking [pdf] (33 points | 8 comments)
4. 'Bluey's World': How a Cute Aussie Puppy Became a $2B Juggernaut (45 points | 33 comments)
5. Global population datasets systematically underrepresent rural population (63 points | 25 comments)
6. Mathup: Easy MathML authoring tool with a quick to write syntax (37 points | 7 comments)
7. Artificial Intelligence Learns to Reason (11 points | 1 comment)
8. Career Development: What It Means to Be a Manager, Director, or VP (2015) (321 points | 157 comments)
9. Show HN: Torch Lens Maker – Differentiable Geometric Optics in PyTorch (104 points | 31 comments)
10. GoGoGrandparent (YC S16) is hiring Back end Engineers ( | hide)
11. Ancient DNA Shows Stone Age Europeans Voyaged by Sea to Africa (11 points | discuss)
12. Liberapay (110 points | 32 comments)
13. 'The Celts: A Modern History' by Ian Stewart Review (68 points | 16 comments)
14. Wheel Reinventor’s Principles (2024) (165 points | 86 comments)

20. Game of Trees (8 points | 1 comment)
21. Apple shuffles AI executive ranks in bid to turn around Siri (259 points | 427 comments)
22. Napkin Math Tool (73 points | 21 comments)
23. Numbering should start at zero (1982) (81 points | 197 comments)
24. Sync Engines Are the Future (260 points | 169 comments)
25. Manifest: A 1-file micro-back end (70 points | 35 comments)
26. Retro Boy: simple Game Boy emulator written in Rust, can be played on the web (301 points | 92 comments)
27. 'The Maverick's Museum' Review: Albert Barnes and the Art of Collecting (11 points | 6 comments)
28. London's Heathrow Airport announces complete shutdown due to power outage (176 points | 188 comments)
29. The Frontend Treadmill (684 points | 628 comments)
30. NASA Whoosh Rocket (143 points | 79 comments)
